schema.name: 2018/10/16 Beef Steak Failed

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the red onion and set aside.
Marinate the beef sukiyaki meat with calamansi juice, salt, and ground pepper. Ensure each piece is well-coated. Let it sit for at least 15 minutes.
Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the marinated beef for about 3-4 minutes on each side or until it reaches your desired doneness.
Remove the beef from the pan and let it rest for a couple of minutes.
In the same pan, add the sliced red onion and sauté until translucent and slightly caramelized, about 5 minutes.
Serve the beef topped with the sautéed red onion.

schema.description: This beef steak recipe brings a healthy twist to your meal, making it perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet. It's part of our Healthified Recipes, ensuring you get both flavor and nutrition in every bite.
